name: Gift Of The Mentor
Lore: 'Luke relied on Obi-Wan''s knowledge and advice to learn the ways of the Force. Obi-Wan continued to counsel Luke long after the old Jedi''s apparent ''death.''',
Text: 'If Luke and Obi-Wan or Yoda are in a battle together, you may add two battle destiny. OR Use 1 Force to search through your Reserve Deck and take any one lightsaber into your hand. Shuffle deck, cut and replace.',
